column4: ive just iunstalled ubuntu with an online install, but it didn't update grub, so it won't boot. How do i set grub up for ubuntu without a liveCD and without being able to boot...
ive just iunstalled ubuntu with an online install, but it didn't update grub, so it won't boot. How do i set grub up for ubuntu without a liveCD and without being able to boot...
You have to be able to access at least the partition where you have it installed
